deal.title: Las Vegas Live Comedy Club - Any Available Date at 9:00pm Through Dec. 30, 2018 (Reserve in Advance)
deal.short_title: Las Vegas Live Comedy Club - Any Available Date at 9:00pm Through D...
deal.description: This top comedy club brings the nation's hottest comedians to the heart of the Strip for the best in stand-up comedy -- with a splash of Vegas glitz. The nightly show features stars from HBO, Showtime, Comedy Central and beyond performing on the V Theater stage in the Miracle Mile shops at Planet Hollywood. Enjoy cutting-edge performances from a mix of the funniest local talent, well-known comics from around the country and tomorrow's most talented up-and-coming stars with headliner Edwin San Juan at the Las Vegas Live Comedy Club.The tickets identified in this promotion are made available through Goldstar. Groupon is not affiliated with or sponsored by V Theater at the Miracle Mile Shops in connection with this deal. This offer is not eligible for promo codes.
deal.fine_print: Voucher is good for any available date through December 30, 2018. Reservations must be made at least 24 hours in advance and are subject to availability. Please call box office at 702-260-7200 ahead of time to hear the list of blackout dates or check their website. ALL SALES FINAL. Groupon promo codes may not be used for this offer. Discount reflects current ticket prices, which may change. Ticket value includes all fees. deal.title: And Another Chicago Slice
deal.description: Slice is dedicated to making authentic, handcrafted, local pizza easily accessible to pizza lovers around the country. We care about the craft, history, and artistry involved in making every local pie unique, and set out to help you order from your favorite, hard-to-get-a-hold-of, mom and pop pizzeria as easily as possible.But our love for pizza goes both ways. Slice also gives these small, independent pizzerias the tools and technology needed to compete with the big pizza chains breathing life into the authentic artisanal food that is falling by the wayside and building up the local shops that bring your community together, one slice at a time. Because eating real pizza should be really easy.

deal.description: What’s included: up to 5 or 6 (Euro) quarts of oil Days/time slot for service: Monday–Saturday 8 a.m.–5 p.m. Tire rotation helps prevent uneven wear on tread, keeping tires safe and reliable for longer. FAQs How often should I change my oil?: It depends on your individual car. A safe bet is to refer to the mileage on the windshield sticker from your last oil change. What kind of oil should I use?: It all depends on your individual vehicle. Check your owner’s manual or call the shop before purchasing your voucher to make sure you get the right type.
deal.fine_print: Appointment required, same day appointments accepted. All oil changes are up to 5 quarts, except for Euro, which is up to 6 quarts. Limit 1 per person. May be repurchased every 180 days. Valid only for option purchased.

deal.title: Carrot Top
deal.description: Be there when Carrot Top sets up comedy shop in the Atrium Showroom at the Luxor Hotel and Casino, pulling out all the tricks from his trunks of comedy props and crazy inventions to entertain you. The comedian and pop culture icon is as well-known for his signature sense of humor and wacky performance style as he is for his massive muscles and trademark shock of red hair. This award-winning comedian has been entertaining audiences for decades, and now you can catch him rocking the Las Vegas strip at the Luxor.The tickets identified in this promotion are made available through Goldstar. Groupon is not affiliated with or sponsored by Carrot Top in connection with this deal. This offer is not eligible for promo codes.

deal.title: “V - The Ultimate Variety Show” at the V Theater (Up to 47% Off)
deal.short_title: "V - The Ultimate Variety Show" – Up to 47% Off
deal.description: Laughter is a universally recognized response to hilarious situations, awkward moments, and malfunctioning funny bones. Chuckle in good company with this deal for “V - The Ultimate Variety Show” at the V Theater, located in the Miracle Mile Shops inside of Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino. Shows run nightly at 7 p.m. and 8:30 p.m. Choose between the following options: $49.99 for one general admission ticket (up to $94.81 value) To view seating chart, click here. Tickets also available for VEGAS! THE SHOW, Popovich Comedy Pet Theater and Nathan Burton Comedy Magic Combining a wide array of entertaining acts from around the world, “V - The Ultimate Variety Show” delights audiences with special effects, magic acts, side-torturing comedy, visual arts, acrobatic performances, and much more. Although many Vegas shows enthrall audiences with comedic standup, acrobatic feats, or got-your-nose antics, “V - The Ultimate Variety Show” covers the entire spectrum of entertainment, providing a diverse collection of performances sure to please disagreeing groups or argumentative hydras. Performers of the rotating cast include hand-balancers Iouri and Gabor, the skating daredevil duo The Skating Aratas, Turf from America’s Got Talent, and the Quiddlers from NBC’s I Can Do That.
deal.fine_print: Reservation recommended. Redeem for a ticket at venue Box Office. Must show valid ID at V Theater. Discount reflects V Theater's current ticket prices-price may differ on day of the event. Doors open 30mins before showtime. For ADA seating, call box office promptly upon receipt of voucher - availability is limited. Valid only for option purchased. Not valid with other offers or promotions.

deal.title: Pampas Churrascaria
deal.description: Located in the beautiful Desert Passage Shops of The Planet Hollywood Resort Hotel and Casino, this one of a kind restaurant is here with a unique offering. The easy and convenient entrance is located at the corner of the Strip, Las Vegas Blvd and Harmon. There is complimentary valet parking and no walking through crowded hotels to reach the restaurant. Dine at your own pace. Eat as much as you like. Sizzling skewers brought to your table in a seemingly endless parade of food. Sit back, relax and enjoy the Ultimate Dining Experience at Pampas Brazilian Grille. Mountains of garden fresh produce and salads together with the finest spit roasted meats available all to your hearts content. Since the very first spit was laid across the searing coals out in the Pampas plains of Brazil, very little has changed. Gathering together to celebrate the Gaucho of the Pampas plains always brought their finest to the fire. Local farmers joined in by contributing the best their fertile soils had brought forth. The best meats and produce were served simply with little or no adornment in order to showcase their natural goodness. Today we continue this time honored tradition the Gaucho of the Pampas plains which began over two centuries ago by bringing you the best everyday. Are you looking for that unique venue to entertain your guests. Pampas is the place to come for an interactive dining experience. By planning your next leisure group, business lunch or dinner, wedding, shower, rehearsal dinner, social or corporate event with us you ensure your clients, co workers or friends and family the most energized environment available. From the latest technological amenities to the finest food and service, Pampas Brazilian Grille delivers a dynamic experience. If success is what you require for your clients or guests call us to provide only the best. Come Celebrate.
